short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real time help desk in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant , Realtime Help Right in Your Browser

H For Help lets you receive 1 -1 realtime help right within your browser. Getting Started is easy . You just need to signup on our website https://hforhelp.org and download the extension . You can then login to our extension. 

The extension is free and simple to use. You can use it to get help on nearly every topic though we have just enabled programming help as of now. If you cant find suitable topics just reach us on Twitter https://twitter.com/joinhforhelp

To start getting help on the extension you just need to set "What topic are you working on today " & "your relevant experience with the topic". The extension then automatically connects you to more experienced people in the topic you are working on.

The whole system works in a bank like credit system where every new account starts with certain minutes of help. You get additional minutes either by helping someone or inviting your friends to the platform.

To use our pro features like screen sharing and 1-1 voice calls you need to buy pro minutes

Your referral id is right inside your accounts section.

Anytime you want you can get disconnected to our network by going "Offline".
